snippet.title: Kelipot - Game Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Kelipot is a story-driven action platformer with rogue-lite elements and fully hand-illustrated 2D visuals.

A mysterious plague devoured the ancient town of Celephais without warning. In the hope of saving his brother, in the hope of rescuing all those lost to the madness, Prince Abel must venture alone into the fiend-infested ruins.
Traverse countless timelines, search for the old friends who have survived, investigate the cause of the plague and uncover the answers behind every questions.

Steam: https://bit.ly/2YXsLoA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KelipotGame
